name: Five Bottle Natural Maple Wine Rack
description:
This one of a kind Inkwood rack was made from a salvaged maple tree on the East side of Cleveland. It is designed to hold 5 bottles of wine in a pattern that matches the natural variations and knots in the tree's trunk. This inkwood creation is perfect to display your favorite wines at the ready. It will be a conversation piece your guests will remember. The rack has been finished to bring out the brilliance of the wood's deep golden grain. The live edges of this piece have been preserved to ensure it is one a kind.

I will make every effort to ship orders within 3 business days upon receipt of payment. At this time, I accept PayPal payments. Please feel free to contact me with any questions and thank you for looking!

Measures 42.5" x 11.5" x 2.5"
Approximate weight 10lbs.
Easily mounts with 4 included screws.

Made in the heart of Cleveland, O.
